twitter.title: Healthways Revises Financial Guidance for 2015

article_summary:
NASHVILLE, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Alfred Lumsdaine, interim chief executive officer of Healthways (NASDAQ: HWAY), today announced that the Company is revising its financial guidance for 2015.
Results are achieved by addressing longitudinal health risks and care needs of everyone in a given population.
Consequently the Company now expects EBITDA margin for 2015 in a range of approximately 8.0% to 8.5%.
The Company expects the resulting impact on EBITDA from this revenue reduction to be approximately $20 million at the mid-point of the revised revenue guidance range.
Finally, the Company has encountered a slower pace of near-term business development for Blue Zones project opportunities originally anticipated for 2015.
